Html:
For some reason I can not find Wrathful in items. I may not be doing something right. I have made sure the filters are set correctly and still nothing. If I have the item on my toon when I reload from armory it shows up.

The item that I am trying to find is Wrathful Gladiator's Band of Dominance.

Thanks in advance.
The Default Item Cache probably doesn't have any of the Wrathful gear, you will have to add it
